title: Button
description: Add a button linking to another page or external site.

fields.name: text
fields.title: Button Text: This displays on the button itself.

fields.name: url
fields.title: Button Url: Specify the URL this button should lead to.

fields.name: ref-type
fields.title: Link Reference Type: Choose relref if the link is site relative, href if external.

fields.name: classes
fields.title: CSS Classes: Specify a space separated list of classes.
